original_title: 修羅之介斬魔剣　妖魔伝説
overview: A gang of evil ninjas has stolen the sacred sword of the Lady Mayu and are demanding that her family exchange her for the family treasure. The world's greatest swordsman, Shuranosuke Sakaki, is called in to get the sword back.
tagline: His heart craves vengeance . . . his sword demands blood!
title: Legend of the Devil
